QueryId : 1595

 // Query General_Android_Find_Request_Permissions
// ----------------------------------------------
// The purpose of the query to found all permissions required by application
// This is NOT vulnerability list, just allow customer to verify which resources are 
// required by 3d party application
result = All.FindByShortName("*android.permission.*");
